description.value:
Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Personal
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Your agility offers you unique opportunities when countering attacks. Make an Escape Artist attempt against your foe's attack roll. If you succeed, you negate the attack and may gain an extra effect of your choice. Move 5 feet into any space you could normally occupy. Move your foe 5 feet into any space they could normally occupy. Neither you nor your foe's movement provokes an attack of opportunity. Exploit: Make an Escape Artist check with a DC equal to the target's CMD. If successful, you may knock your foe prone.
